items.content_html: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.
items.title: 4D4J/Mind-Mapper: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.

items.content_html: Node.js + Express Boilerplate with GraphQL A clean and extensible boilerplate for building scalable Node.js applications using Express and GraphQL. items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.

items.content_html: A lightweight React counter application built with modular components and optimized using million.js for virtual DOM performance. Includes features like prime number validation, history tracking, and dynamic counter configuration. Showcasing advanced React state management and performance best practices.
items.title: SalahShallapy/Optimized-Counter-App: A lightweight React counter application built with modular components and optimized using million.js for virtual DOM performance. Includes features like prime number validation, history tracking, and dynamic counter configuration. Showcasing advanced React state management and performance best practices.

items.content_html: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesn‚Äôt rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.
